greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fourth (unsigned) column sequence of triangle A062139 (generalized a=2 Laguerre).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: If we define f(n,i,x)= Sum_{k=i..n} (Sum_{j=i..k} binomial(k,j)*Stirling1(n,k)*Stirling2(j,i)*x^(k-j) then a(n-3)=(-1)^(n-1)*f(n,3,-6), (n>=3). - _Milan Janjic_, Mar 01 2009
program: (Sage) [binomial(n,5)*factorial (n-2)/6 for n in range(5, 21)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 07 2009
(PARI) { f=2; for (n=0, 100, f*=n + 3; write("b062193.txt", n, " ", f*binomial(n + 5, 5)/6) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
